metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43400 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in gatt-database.c in BlueZ 5.61. A use-after-freecan occur when a client disconnects during D-Bus processing of a WriteValuecall.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-43400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bluetooth - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
bluez - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-cups - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-hcidump - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-obexd - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
bluez-tests - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
libbluetooth3 - 5.48-0ubuntu3.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: bluez package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.48-0ubuntu3.6').
